devdoc.details: Handles staking allowances and acts as a proxy for staking pools

params._token: the token address used by the staking pool
the token address used by the staking pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDelegatorPool(address).details: must be set for pool router to work

setWrappedETH(address).details: must be set for ETH staking to work, can only be set once

params._index: index of pool to stake in
index of pool to stake in*

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: PoolRouter

allPools().notice: Fetch a list of all pools

canDeposit(address,address,uint16).notice: calculates the amount of stake an account can deposit based on it's allowance staked

canDepositByAllowance(address,uint16,uin.notice: calculates the amount of stake that can be deposited for an amount of allowance

getReservedMultiplier().notice: returns the allocation multiplier while in reserved mode

isReservedMode().notice: returns whether any pool is in reserved mode

onTokenTransfer(address,uint256,bytes).notice: ERC677 implementation to receive a token stake

poolUtilisation(address,uint16).notice: returns the percentange utilisation of the pool

setPoolStatusClosed(address,uint16).notice: sets a pool's status to CLOSED

setReservedModeActive(address,uint16,boo.notice: sets whether a pool is reserved by only the allowance stakers

setReservedSpaceMultiplier(uint256).notice: sets the multiplier for stake per allowance when the pool has reserved space for allowance stakers

stake(address,uint16,uint256).notice: stakes tokens in a staking pool

stakeETH(uint16).notice: wraps ETH and stakes wrapped ETH in a staking pool

supportedTokens().notice: Returns a list of all supported tokens

withdraw(address,uint16,uint256).notice: withdraws tokens from a staking pool

withdrawETH(uint16,uint256).notice: withdraws wrapped ETH from a staking pool and unwraps
